channel.title: Poem
channel.description:
I'll be completely honest, I suck at doing artsy stuff unless I'm in the mood for it. I have to do a poem for English, and I'm sure as hell not in a relaxed-enough mood; just finished term exams, and I'm having fights with parents about moving back where I want to.
Anyways, what I could use is a Free Verse Poem, with 2 stanzas (4 lines each) and a short (maybe 5-word) conclusion-like statement. The topic I chose was Inner Darkness (pretty emo, eh?).
If any of you could do this; or post even a line or two if you don't want to do the whole thing, you would be fucking godly. :P

Violets are blue,
I can’t play moparscape,
What should I do?[/quote]
lawl.

roses are red
and violets are blue,
i hate you,
so i wont rape u

item.title: Poem
item.dc:creator: @Xo_0wner_oX Xo 0wner oX
item.description:
@Xo_0wner_oX wrote:

She whispered “will it hurt me?”
“Of course not” answered he
“It’s a very simple process,
You can rely on me.”

She said “I’m very frightened,
I’ve not had this before.
My friend has had it five times
And said it can be sore.”

It was growing rather painful
Tears formed in her eyes
It was hurting quite a bit now
It must have been a size.

“Calm yourself” he whispered
"His face filled with a grin
“Try and open wider
So I can get it in.”

“It’s coming now” he whispered
“I know” she cried in bliss
Feeling it deep within her now
She said “I am glad I’m having this.”

And with a final effort
She gave a frightened shout
He gripped it in anguish
And quickly pulled it out.

She lay back quite contended
Sighed and gave a smile
She said “I’m glad I came now
You made it worth my while.”

Now if you read this carefully
The dentist you will find
Is not what you imagined
It’s just your dirty mind!! [br][size=1]Posted on: October 12, 2007, 01:16:31 AM[/size][hr]Sunday morning, in the S-bend, you could see him arrive,
He was nine inches long and two inches wide,
Kind of broad in the center, narrow in the tip,
Bobbing in the bowl like a brown battleship,
Big Poo.

Big Poo…oo.
Big Bad Poo.
Big Poo…

He emerged from the bowels of Lady Jane,
With a fair bit of grunting’ and a whole lot of pain.
He squeezed through her cheeks with fire and ash,
And into the bowl with one hell of a splash.
Big Poo.

Well, he started his life the day before,
As a nice, juicy beefsteak that was medium raw.
Alfalfa and vegetables hung him long,
And two hot cross buns made him awfully strong.
Big Poo.

Six glasses of wine lubricated his wake,
With some added propulsion from a chocolate cake,
And the big, lumpy midriff that bumped in the bowl,
Was the seed from a lichee she’d swallowed whole.
Big Poo.

It took fourteen flushes to send him away,
But the skid-marks he left clung on ten days.
This wasn’t the end of his journey south,
He collected eight tampons and one dead mouse.
Big Poo.

This was Just the beginning of something’ more,
There were curried prawns buried deep in his core,
They brewed that gas they run engines from,
And this floating log became an atom bomb!
Big Poo.

Well, he snuck through a valve at the treatment shed,
Where he lurked in the chemicals 'till they ate his head,
Then with a rush of gas and an almighty bang,
The whole plant went up, and the fat lady sang.
Big Poo.

Well, there wasn’t a whole lot left of the site,
It was leveled to the ground by brown dynamite,
So they inscripted a plaque, and upon it was writ:
“At the bottom of this sewer, lies a big, mean shit…
…Big Poo.”

item.title: Poem
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

First off before you get confused
I’ll let you know that you’re being used
That bitch who says shes your girlfriend
the one you say you’ll be with till the end
she’s the one you buy mad shit for
the one who fucks like a dirty whore
but is still wicked smart does well in school
sucks great dick but never broke a rule
she likes it in the ass but never touches yours
she makes you cookies cakes and smores
this girl, man, she’s the one?
Shit dude I hate to ruin your fun
but
I fucked her last night and you know what she said?
While she was with you she might as well have been dead
cause your dick is small and flabby and brown
its smaller than the cocks in chinatown
she said shes had firmer handshakes
shes sorry she baked you all those cakes
she wants to make me some brownies instead
and then chill out and give me head

Your reputation for robbing banks, well,
I’ve robbed Fort Knox with nuclear powered tanks
I conquered Russia in a ground war
I made the queen of England suck like a whore
I shot up heroin with my boy Kurt Kobain
before I introduced Chuck Norris to a new world of pain

Read full topic

item.title: Poem
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

bitch I got something to say
everybody thinks that you are gay
you’re rappin about popcorn and blades
but you fucked your dad so you have aids

you’re over there with your hand on the mouse
writing shitty rhymes and fucking around
in the meantime I’m fucking your spouse
and if you come here I’ll beat you to the ground

you might steal lunch money from little kids
i’m going to hammer nails into your eye lids
but you talkin bout me and you know I rob banks
and when i roll out they tell me thanks

they do that because I have a reputation
and that reputation is my foundation
spreading my rhymes across the land
while commanding with my pimp hand

Read full topic

item.title: Poem
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

You think you’re real
with your religious spiel
but your gangster image is incomplete
and your slang is jive you can’t compete
only bad news for kids in second grade
steal their lunch money so your mom gets paid
you’ve never been laid and you don’t own a blade
the only smoke session you’ve ever had
is when your microwave popcorn went bad
you think you got something to say?
then say it motherfucker, or go away.

Read full topic
